definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: As of Tuesday, the volcano in Iceland was still erupting, though the cloud was lower.
sentences.chinese: 截至週二，冰島火山仍在噴發，但火山灰雲有所降低。

sentences.english: Ashfalls can suffocate plants and poison livestock.
sentences.chinese: 降落的火山灰能悶死植物，毒害牲畜。

sentences.english: This resembles volcanic ash, which is predominantly composed of minerals such as pyroxene and olivine.
sentences.chinese: 這類似於火山灰，這是主要組成礦物如輝石和橄欖石。

sentences.english: Horses are herded to safety away from volcanic ash April 17, 2010 near Eyjafjallajokull, Iceland.
sentences.chinese: 冰島艾雅法拉火山附近馬羣逃離火山灰。

sentences.english: An ash cone rises from the center of the crater, casting a dark triangular shadow.
sentences.chinese: 火山口中間是火山灰錐，投下了三角形的暗影。

sentences.english: Weather satellites have observed a ring of volcanic ash girdling the earth.
sentences.chinese: 氣象衛星觀測到一個環繞地球的火山灰帶。

sentences.english: The Fire Engulfs Your Body, AttackedYou Hit The Floor, An Oily Of Ash.
sentences.chinese: 消防吞蝕你的身體，攻擊你打地板，油性的火山灰。

sentences.english: Kasatochi, Okmok and Cleveland all spewed giant ash plumes into the air.
sentences.chinese: 奧克莫克和騎士都噴出火山灰在空中巨人羽。

sentences.english: A huge eruption sentclouds of ash 20,000 feet in the air.
sentences.chinese: 這次的大爆發使火山灰雲衝上2萬尺的高空。

sentences.english: Disruptions to air travel from the volcanic eruption in Iceland is hurting demand for jet fuel.
sentences.chinese: 由冰島火山灰所導致的航班停滯打擊了航油需求。

sentences.english: Much of Europe's air traffic was grounded last month because of ash from an erupting volcano under the Eyjafjallajokull glacier in Iceland.
sentences.chinese: 受冰島火山灰影響，歐洲多數航班上月被迫停飛。

sentences.english: It’s built on volcanic rock and ash.
sentences.chinese: 該城建立在火成岩與火山灰上。

sentences.english: Ash from the volcano disrupted air traffic in Europe for more than a month.
sentences.chinese: 火山灰使歐洲的空中交通被破壞了長達一個月之久。

sentences.english: Ash may now also found no evidence of drift to Jakarta.
sentences.chinese: 現在也沒有發現火山灰可能飄至雅加達的跡象。

sentences.english: High hydration temperature advances the pozzolanic reaction of fly ash.
sentences.chinese: 高溫水化條件下粉煤灰的火山灰反應提前發生。

sentences.english: There will be some places on Earth where no detectible ash falls.
sentences.chinese: 地球上一些地方將沒有可察覺的火山灰沉降物。

definition: variant of 岩層|岩层[yan2 ceng2]/rock strata
